ComicInfo.Summary:
Anthony has done the impossible by becoming the newest member of the Infinite Seven, Smash Brannagan. But can he survive his first mission? Training Day gets a new meaning as Anthony and Washington track the Sandsnake to Japan!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Regular Cover A | Arturo Mesa | 1 | B | Movie Poster Cover B, Limited to 1500 | Arturo Mesa | 2 | C | Artist Variant Cover C, Limited to 1500 | Josh Greathouse | 3 | D | "Sherlock" Interlocking Cover D, Limited to 1500 | Arturo Mesa | 4 | E | "Washington" Interlocking Cover E, Limited to 1500 | Arturo Mesa | 5 | Note: Covers D and E interlock with 5 covers to be released throughout the first arc to form an Infinite Seven Poster!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-11-27 15:59:27. [CVDB590680]
ComicInfo.Characters: Agent Cinco, Anthony Zane, Cyborg, James Moriarty, Lars Wolfsberg, Lord Ellington, Master Zhen, Sandsnake, Sherlock Holmes, Sherlock Moriarty, Washington
